choices.label: The figure shows the graph of a curve in the first quadrant of a coordinate plane. The horizontal axis is labeled “t,” and the value t sub p is indicated near the end of the axis. As it approaches the horizontal axis, the curve begins to level out and is nearly horizontal as it ends on the horizontal axis at t sub p.
